analysis.description:
Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/20/0x8c5227134c834815d0dfa5c6d66d9aaa281aeae0.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_chucks/20/0x8c5227134c834815d0dfa5c6d66d9aaa281aeae0.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/20/0x8c5227134c834815d0dfa5c6d66d9aaa281aeae0.sol#76-78) is not in mixedCase
